SEARCH

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
User
Staff
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActions
public class Staff extends User
The Staff represents the staff that manages the camp management system. The Staff class will hold the information of userID, name, faculty, all enquiries/suggestions/camp information. The Staff can create a new camp, view all camps/enquiries/suggestions information, and process the suggestion.

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String userID, String password, String email, String faculty, boolean isLocked)
      Constructs a Staff with empty camp.
      Parameters:
      userID - The id of the student.
      password - The user's password
      email - The email address of the student.
      faculty - The faculty the student is from.
      isLocked - true if the user is locked, otherwise false.

    • Staff

      public Staff(String userID, String password, String email, String faculty, boolean isLocked, HashMap<Integer,Camp> createdCamps)
      Constructs a Staff with exisiting created camp from the database.
      Parameters:
      userID - The id of the student.
      password - The user's password
      email - The email address of the student.
      faculty - The faculty the student is from.
      isLocked - true if the user is locked, otherwise false.
      createdCamps - The HashMap of campID and Camp object created by the staff.

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(String campName, String description, boolean openToAll, boolean isVisible, ArrayList<Date> campDates, String location, Date registrationDeadline, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots)
      Creates a new camp
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      description - The description of the camp.
      openToAll - A boolean indicating whether the camp is open to all faculty.
      isVisible - A boolean indicating whether the camp can be shown to student.
      campDates - The ArrayList of Date that the camp will be held.
      location - The location of the camp.
      registrationDeadline - The Date of deadline for the camp registration.
      totalSlots - The maximum total number of slots for attendees and committees combined.
      campCommitteeSlots - The maximum number of slotes reserved for camp committees.

    • getSuggestions

      public ArrayList<Suggestion> getSuggestions()
      Retrieves the list of suggestions submitted to the staff.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Suggestion.

    • getUnprocessedSuggestions

      public ArrayList<Suggestion> getUnprocessedSuggestions()
      Retrieves the list of unprocesssed suggestions.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Suggestion that has not yet been processed.

    • processSuggestion

      public void processSuggestion(int suggestionID, boolean approvalStatus, String reply)
      Approves or Rejects the submitted suggestions, and Makes a reply message.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - The ID of suggestion to process.
      approvalStatus - A boolean indicating whether to accept or reject the suggestion.
      reply - The reply message to show to camp committee that raise the suggestion.

      Parameters:
      enquiryID - The ID of enquiry to reply to
      reply - The reply message

    • deleteCamp

      public void deleteCamp(Camp camp) throws CampException
      Deletes the camp and Remove the camp from the registry The camp that has student registered cannot be deleted and the CampException will be shown.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp object to be deleted
      Throws:
      CampException - If the camp cannot be deleted
